Package curam.util.rules

Class Summary
EvidenceFormatConverter Converts old tab delimited evidence format into new tab delimited compressed format.
EvidenceTextDecoder Class that decodes the compressed evidence text into in-memory object.
FixedNumericFormatConversion This utility class is used for converting strings to Money, double and float values.
Interrule This class contains all the methods required to invoke execution or business rules.
ItemGroupGlobals This class contains data items that are accessible to all the eligibility rule sets.
ItemListGroup ItemListGroup is a super class of all the list RDOs.
ItemSVR_BOOLEAN Fundamental data item type.
ItemSVR_CHAR Fundamental data item type.
ItemSVR_DATE Fundamental data item type.
ItemSVR_DATETIME Fundamental data item type.
ItemSVR_DOUBLE Fundamental data item type.
ItemSVR_FLOAT Fundamental data item type.
ItemSVR_FREQUENCY Fundamental data item type.
ItemSVR_INT16 Fundamental data item type.
ItemSVR_INT32 Fundamental data item type.
ItemSVR_INT64 Fundamental data item type.
ItemSVR_INT8 Fundamental data item type.
ItemSVR_MONEY Fundamental data item type.
ItemSVR_STRING Fundamental data item type.
Loader The base class for rules data "loaders" which are written as a part of an application to load data from external data sources to Rules Data Objects for use with Rules Engine.
ResultBuffer This class holds the result text data generated by the ResultTextDecoder class in the form of an object tree and provides methods to return result in XML and tab delimited text format.
ResultTextDecoder This class constructs the result text using the rule set document and the rules engine execution flow bits.
ResultTextWrapper This class is a wrapper for the existing String representation of result text of the rules engine.
RULES Generated rules message file.
RulesEngine A utility class that provides execution-mode constants for rules.
RulesObjectiveResult This class contains information about the achieved objective.
RulesParameters This class acts as a super class to hold all the IEG and rules engine execution related parameters.
RulesResult This class contains consolidated rules execution results.
TagResult This class contains either information used to determine the value of RulesObjectiveResultor non-financial information such as recommendation for other products or assessments associated with the achieved RulesObjectiveResult.
